article.title: En Pointe to Provide Software Assurance
article.text: En Pointe Gov Inc., Gardena, California, has been awarded a maximum $11,207,546 modification (P00003) exercising the first option year to a one-year base contract (SP4701-14-F-0035) with two one-year option periods for Microsoft software assurance, maintenance, and support. This is a firm-fixed-price contract. Location of performance is California with a Dec. 25, 2015 performance completion date. Using service is federal civilian agencies. Type of appropriation is fiscal year 2015 defense working capital funds. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Contract Services Office, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
